author: Josh Davies
description: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass.Special ingredient #1: Homemade raspberry shrub (6% abv)Special ingredient #2: Homemade thyme sugar syrup (2:1)
name: Leave A Message After The Beep...
recipeIngredient: 10 ml Martini Rubino Riserva Speciale vermouth

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker
DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass
